analysis.description:
Microverse._addWeiAmount (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#880-912) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(spaceshipInstance).transfer(weiDividendPart) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#909)
	- MCAddress.transfer(weiMCPart) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#909-910)
	- address(owner).transfer(weiEMFPart) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#910)

RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#140-144) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#156-162)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#168-173)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#179-188)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#194-202)

Microverse.finishDividends (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-spaceshipInstance.startSpaceship() (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol)
	-portalGunInstance.startRick() (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol)

Reentrancy in Microverse.buyMorty (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#811-828):
	External calls:
	- weiReturn = garageInstance.citadelBuy(msg.value,msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#815-819)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(weiReturn) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#820-823)
	- _addWeiAmount(address(this).balance.sub(previousWeiBalance)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#824-828)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- previousWeiBalance (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#824-828)

Reentrancy in Microverse.constructor (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#722-736):
	External calls:
	- EvilMortyAddress = garageInstance.getEvilMortyAddress() (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#734-735)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- MCAddress (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#735-736)

Microverse.upgradeComponent uses assembly (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol

MicroverseBase.FACTOR should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#345-347)
PortalGunInterFace.numTickets should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#513-515)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#247-249) should be declared external
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#253-256) should be declared external
Superuser.transferSuperuser (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#311-316) should be declared external
Microverse.fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#737-740) should be declared external
Microverse.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xd967acb1fb0d9e3ed6991590de6f373abd75d0b7.sol#746-758) should be declared external
